messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:I'm sniveling, I admit..or, lonely and need some W...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/31/2007 6:00:44 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time, debra.rossing@mastercam.com writes: Don t  have any advice (gentle or harsh) not having a teen
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/31/2007 6:00:44 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
debra.rossing@... writes:

Don't have any advice (gentle or harsh) not having a teen yet (DS is
just turned 9) but I will send some {{{HUGS}}} your way

Deb


Thanks, Deb. I posted a bit ago re: the "Snarky" stuff and added a bit of
history to the mess.

My heart is full of love for my lovely, talented, amazing daughter...This is
just ne hard bit of ick in my life. I'm glad to have even virtual hugs - I
now they are sincere.

Karen
